tns:patch.author: Alexandru Artimon
tns:patch.description: recreate view, this will always be the last version of the view

script.lang: SELECT settingsvalue FROM amp_global_settings where settingsname='Recreate the views on the next server restart';

CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW v_beneficiary_agency_info AS SELECT aor.activity AS amp_activity_id, aor.additional_info, aor.organisation AS amp_org_id FROM amp_org_role aor, amp_role r WHERE ((aor.role = r.amp_role_id) AND ((r.role_code)::text = 'BA'::text));;;
